required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Cross-sectional Study of Ultrasonic Diagnosis of Iliac Joint Capsule Muscle
clinical_study.official_title: A Cross-sectional Study: the Development of the Hip Joint Was Studied by Measuring the Anatomical Circumference of the Capsular Muscle of the Iliac Joint With Ultrasound Doppler

brief_summary.textblock: In order to investigate the relationship between the iliac joint capsular muscle and the development of the hip joint, this study used ultrasound Doppler to measure the anatomical circumference of the iliac joint capsular muscle to explore the relationship

detailed_description.textblock: In order to investigate the relationship between the iliac joint capsular muscle and the development of the hip joint, this study used ultrasound Doppler to measure the anatomical circumference of the iliac joint capsular muscle to explore the relationship.Ultrasound was used to compare the size of the iliac joint cystic muscle in the three groups: patients with developmental dysplasia of the hip (DDH), patients with Pincer type femoral hip impingement, and normal control group. The shear wave velocity and shear modulus of the iliac joint capsular muscle of three groups were compared to compare the degree of fat infiltration in muscle.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Ultraphonic was conducted when patients were included in the study from March to October, 2019
primary_outcome.description: The anatomical circumference of the capsular muscle of the iliac joint was measured by ultrasound Doppler，including the dimensional ultrasonic gram and shear wave elasticity diagram

arm_group.description: patients with developmental dysplasia of hip

intervention.description: A cross-sectional study:the development of the hip joint was studied by measuring the anatomical circumference of the capsular muscle of the iliac joint with ultrasound Doppler

study_pop.textblock: Patients who were admitted to the sports medicine outpatient department of Peking University Third Hospital for hip surgery and volunteers recruited as control group，including 40 patients with developmental dysplasia of the hip 40 femoroacetabular impingement patients and 40 healthy volunteers as the control group.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- ≥ 20 years;
- Clinically suspected of DDH or Pincer and underwent surgery
- Understand and sign the informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
- Leggcalve´-Perthes disease
- Muscle diseases
- Hip development disorder
- History of progressive osteoarthritis
- History of hip surgery
- History of arthritis of the hip joint
- With pacemaker or metal in the body

facility.name: Department of Ultrasound Diagnosis, Peking University Third Hospital
